about.title: Rotating 3D cube №2
about.more02: This project is a continuation of the "Rotating 3D cube №1" project. Added different cube models. They move in different directions, being in different orbits.
about.more03: Both pure colors and ready-made textures were used for coloring the cubes. Some sides of the cube have an image on them.
about.more04: There are a LOT of interesting things here! 😉🤓
about.name: Name
